h1: How Many Calories in a Piece of Sourdough Bread?
assumptions: Standard slice (piece) ≈40 g; plain, baked without added fats or toppings; commercial bakery style.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, recipe, slice thickness, fermentation time, and baking method. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: One piece (slice) of sourdough bread has about 100 kcal and 20 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a piece of sourdough bread?
faqs.a: Approximately 100 kcal for a standard 40 g slice.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in sourdough bread per slice?
faqs.a: About 20 g total carbs, including 1 g fiber and 1 g sugars.

faqs.q: Is sourdough bread low in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, typically 1 g fat per slice, with 0.2 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: Does sourdough have more calories than white bread?
faqs.a: Similar; sourdough slice ≈100 kcal, comparable to white bread slice.

faqs.q: How does slice size affect calories in sourdough?
faqs.a: Larger slices (e.g., 50 g) add ~25 kcal; measure for accuracy.
